name: Move Animals!
description:
Play with animals!

This amazing game has a huge variety of levels with animal fighting, training dogs, dinosaur fights, and even a story where you go on an adventure and meet someone special.

Every level is uniquely designed with animals including dogs, cats, bears, elephants, horses, deers, tigers, raccoons, peacock, pandas, kangaroos, birds, DINOSAURS and a lot more...

To play, move the white circles around to control limbs or bodies and place the animals into correct pose or position to complete a level.
